My name is Caroline Ruffin and I am an IT Recruiter with Gravity IT Resources. While doing my research on LinkedIn, I came across your profile which led me to here… We currently have a Sr .NET Technical Lead role for our client, Carnival Cruise Lines, in Doral, FL. I am not sure if you are interested in hearing about new opportunities, but if you aren’t, maybe you know somebody who would be….

Here are the details: Compensation: $110K-$115K base, $2K-$4K bonus opportunity after 1st year Relocation is available

Estimated Referral Bonus: $2,200 (If you are not a fit, but refer us to a great candidate that gets the job, we share 10% of our placement fee with you!)

Company Highlights: Comfortable, “Fun” working environment Many opportunities for professional and personal growth Excellent benefit plans and perks including 401k, on-site gym, day care and health clinic

Position Highlights: Part of a dynamic development team focused on mission critical shipboard applications Integral part of team that will modernize apps from VB6 to C# and VB.NET Leadership, training and mentorship opportunities and great career growth path

Requirements/Qualifications 5-10 years of software development experience Strong ASP.NET, C# and VB.NET programming skills Strong Experience with Microsoft.NET Framework 3.5 & 4.0 Strong Experience with Object Oriented Programming (OOP) techniques Strong Experience with MSSQL and Oracle Databases Great communication skills

I look forward to hearing from you!
